verbs.description: [ARG0: A chain of crises] [V: made] [ARG1: Russia ’s World Cup charm offensive a tough sell] , but President Trump ’s strains with Europe improved its chances .
A chain of crises made Russia ’s World Cup charm offensive a tough sell , but [ARG0: President Trump ’s strains with Europe] [V: improved] [ARG1: its chances] .
